description: The percentage of households living in detached houses.
The percentage of households living in semi-detached houses.
The percentage of households living in terraced houses.
The percentage of households living in a flat, maisonette or apartment.
The percentage of households living in accommodation which they own, either outright, with a mortgage or loan or shared ownership.
The percentage of households living in accommodation which is owned by local authorities or private registered providers such as housing associations.
The percentage of households living in accommodation which is rented from a private landlord or letting agency etc.
